alert.note: Alert for Allen; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Wells; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:16AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Allen, Wabash, Grant, southern Whitley, western Blackford, Huntington, southeastern Kosciusko, central Wells and southeastern Miami Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 615 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Manchester to near Wabash to near Swayzee. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... South Whitley and La Fontaine around 620 AM EDT. Marion and Andrews around 630 AM EDT. Gas City, Fairmount and Jonesboro around 635 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hartford City, Upland, Markle and Van Buren. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 255 and 308. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Wells; Whitley
